Queries.SelectUsuario: SELECT u.Id, u.Cedula, u.Correo, u.NombreYApellido, u.Celular, u.TipoUser, u.Activo, r.IdRol FROM act_User u LEFT JOIN act_RolUser r ON u.Id = r.IdUser WHERE u.Correo = @Correo AND u.Contrasena = @Contrasena
Queries.SelectEmail: SELECT Correo FROM act_User Where Id =1
Queries.SelectDestino: SELECT Id, NumeroCuenta, NombreBanco FROM act_CuentaDestino
Queries.SelectEvents: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Eventos WHERE Estado = 'CONCURSO') AS TotalEventos, x.Id, x.IdUser, x.IdPrestamo, x.FechaInicio, x.FechaFinalizacion, x.FechaGeneracion, x.ParticipantesId, x.ParticipantesNombre, x.Estado, u.NombreYApellido AS NombreUsuario FROM act_Eventos x INNER JOIN act_User u ON x.IdUser = u.Id WHERE x.Estado = 'CONCURSO'
Queries.SelectAportaciones: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Aportaciones) AS TotalAportaciones, a.Id, a.Razon, a.Valor, a.IdUser, a.FechaAportacion, a.Aprobacion, a.CapturaPantalla, u.NombreYapellido AS NombreUsuario FROM act_Aportaciones a INNER JOIN act_User u ON a.IdUser = u.Id
Queries.SelectMultas: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Multas) AS TotalMultas, a.Id, a.IdUser, a.Valor, a.FechaMulta,  u.NombreYApellido AS NombreUsuario FROM act_Multas a INNER JOIN act_User u ON a.IdUser = u.Id
Queries.SelectAdminNotificacion: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Notificaciones WHERE Destino = 'ADMINISTRADOR') AS TotalNotificaciones, a.* FROM act_Notificaciones a WHERE a.Destino ='ADMINISTRADOR'
Queries.SelectUserNotificacion: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Notificaciones WHERE Destino = @Id) AS TotalNotificaciones, a.* FROM act_Notificaciones a WHERE Destino = @Id
Queries.SelectPrestamoId: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE Id = @Id) AS TotalPrestamos, a.* FROM act_Prestamos a WHERE Id = @Id
Queries.SelectPrestamosUser: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalPrestamos, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND Estado = 'APROBADO') AS TotalAprobado, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND Estado IN ('DENEGADO', 'RECHAZADO')) AS TotalRechazado, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND Estado  IN ('PENDIENTE REFERENTE', 'PENDIENTE ADMIN')) AS TotalPendiente, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND TipoCuota ='PagoUnico') AS TotalPagoUnico, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND TipoCuota = 'CUOTA') AS TotalCuota, a.Id, a.Estado, a.Razon, a.Valor FROM act_Prestamos a WHERE IdUser = @IdUser
Queries.SelectEventosUser: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Eventos WHERE Id = @Id) AS TotalEventos, a.* FROM act_Eventos a WHERE Id = @Id
Queries.SelectAportacionesUser: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM  act_Aportaciones WHERE IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalAportaciones, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM  act_Aportaciones WHERE Aprobacion='APROBADO' AND IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalAprobados, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM  act_Aportaciones WHERE Aprobacion='EN ESPERA' AND IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalEspera, a.Id, a.Valor, a.Aprobacion, a.NBanco FROM act_Aportaciones a WHERE a.IdUser = @IdUser
Queries.SelectMultasUser: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Multas WHERE IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalMultas, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Multas WHERE Aprobacion='CANCELADO' AND IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalCancelados, a.Id, a.Valor, a.Aprobacion FROM act_Multas a WHERE a.IdUser=@IdUser
